Modelica.Magnetic.FluxTubes.Shapes

Reluctance and permeance elements respectively based on geometric shapes

Package Content

NameDescription
 FixedShape Flux tubes with fixed shape during simulation and linear or non-linear material characteristics
 Force Flux tubes with reluctance force generation; constant permeability
 Leakage Leakage flux tubes with position-independent permeance and hence no force generation; mu_r=1
